title: George, the Dragon and the Princess
description: Far, far away over the high, high mountains in an old castle wall, in a tiny, tiny hole there lives a little mouse called George. Heâ€™s very small and rather timid and he can be a bit clumsy too. In fact, poor George is so hopeless that he can't even make lunch without burning his cheese on toast! But when a huge and terrifying dragon attacks the castle, George springs into action. Because as fans of George and the Dragon know only too well, George has a very special talent.
author: Christopher Wormell
